item.title: Zelensky to speak to Trump after US proposes Russia-Ukraine peace plan
item.description: The plan was reportedly drafted by US and Russian officials, without Ukraine's involvement.

item.title: Bush lauds Dick Cheney as a 'thinker and listener' at funeral
item.description: Cheney died aged 84 from complications of pneumonia and cardiac and vascular disease in early November.

item.title: COP30 climate talks evacuated after fire breaks out
item.description: Thousands of people are attending the UN climate talks in Brazil.

item.title: 'Huge columns of smoke': BBC at the scene of fire at COP30
item.description: Climate Editor Justin Rowlatt was at the UN climate talks in Brazil when a fire broke out.

item.title: Spain's attorney general convicted in controversial leak case
item.description: Álvaro García Ortiz is barred from the post for two years and must pay €10,000 in compensation.
